data.value: Ocultar barajas con sugerencias de reemplazo incompletas
data.comment: Label for filter to hide decks with missing cards that the user doesn't have good replacements for.

data.value: Ocultar barajas que no tengo cartas para completar

data.comment: Label for filter to hide decks the user doesn't have enough wildcards to complete.

data.name: Label_HideWithFewer
data.comment: Label for "fewer than" filter.

data.comment: Label for first part of filter that hides decks containing more than some number of a specific wildcard rarity.

data.name: TextBlock_EnableDetailed
data.value: Active el registro detallado en Arena yendo a Configuración-> Ver cuenta y marcando "Registros detallados (soporte de complementos)", y navegue hasta la pantalla de su colección antes de ejecutar el Asesor de cubierta diario de Arena. Es posible que deba reiniciar Arena para que el cambio de configuración surta efecto.
data.comment: String for Enabled Detailed Logging message.

data.name: Tooltip_RotationProof

data.comment: The string for the Rotation Proof tooltip.
